last_episode_to_air.name: Big Bad Burt
last_episode_to_air.overview: Preparing for a trial where nothing is black and white, Anthony’s defense team works to show the subtle forms abuse can take and the damage inflicted.

name: I Just Killed My Dad
overview: Anthony Templet shot his father and never denied it. But why he did it is a complex question with profound implications. Explore Anthony's psyche prior to the events of June 3, 2019 and the journey of his mental and emotional aftermath.

episodes.name: I'm Not A Killer
episodes.overview: Family members, police and others involved with the case describe what happened before and after Anthony called 911 to say he'd killed his own father.

episodes.name: I Found My Son
episodes.overview: Anthony’s parents and his inheritance of abuse come into sharper focus, while a grand jury indictment dramatically changes the stakes of the case.

episodes.name: Big Bad Burt
episodes.overview: Preparing for a trial where nothing is black and white, Anthony’s defense team works to show the subtle forms abuse can take and the damage inflicted.
